data.author: EAFW

changelog.release_notes: Major stability improvement for notifications causing watchface to crash.

Fix: Exit stability improvements - fixed crashes on switching face or entering menu.
Improvement: Bluetooth connection monitoring only vibrates if connection lost for 12 seconds - reduces alerts due to momentary connection losses.
New: Battery warning icon when battery 20% or less.
New: Auto power saver - all transition animations disabled on low battery.
Added bluetooth connection monitoring. Watchface will display warning icon and vibrate if no connection.

Changed display invert interaction to reduce accidental changes. Display invert by shaking is now only possible for the first 2.5 seconds after the watchface starts. After this time shaking will only display the date.

v1.2 
Fixed memory leak that caused watchface to crash if displayed for a few hours
Added icon for watchfaces list

v1.1
Automatically sets display color based on watch color (requires v2.7 for stable operation)
Improved date glanceability

data.description:
Similar to "Text Watch" but it displays the time in Roman numerals - it's easier to read than it sounds.

Shake to see the date (not in Roman numerals).

Monitors bluetooth connection and shows warning & vibrates if no connection.

Shows warning on low battery and switches to power saver mode.

"Shake NOW to invert" toggles display  polarity.

latest_release.release_notes: Major stability improvement for notifications causing watchface to crash.

data.title: Roman Numerals
